statements: DELETE FROM vegetation_indices WHERE id = 1 AND region_name = 'Central Park';
DELETE FROM vegetation_indices WHERE latitude < 40.0 OR (ndvi > 0.5 AND evi < 0.3);
DELETE FROM vegetation_indices WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100
DELETE FROM satellite_images WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND file_path LIKE '%example%'
DELETE FROM vegetation_indices WHERE ndvi < 0.2 AND pixel_x > 100;
DELETE FROM image_processing_log WHERE success = false AND process_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ndvi_values WHERE latitude >= 35.123456 AND longitude <= -90.987654
